content.question: Which of the following was the most direct cause of the overall trend in Russia’s output, as shown in the graph?

choices.label: The continued influence of conservative Orthodox Christians in the government
The struggles of Russia’s modernization efforts against the dominant landowning interests

content.answer: The struggles of Russia’s modernization efforts against the dominant landowning interests

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
